mapper.insert: insert into user_info values( user_info_seq.nextval, #{nick}, #{gender}, #{kakao_id}, #{kimg_idx}, sysdate, 'Y' )
mapper.update: update user_info set nick = #{nick}, kimg_idx = #{kimg_idx} where user_idx = #{user_idx}
mapper.delete: update user_info set user_flag = 'N' where user_idx = #{user_idx}
